thread.title: Joseph Westphal Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Advisor to Global Industrial Market Practice

author: cnbc.com
title: Joseph Westphal Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Advisor to Global Industrial Market Practice

organizations.name: wharton school of the university of pennsylvania
joseph h. lauder institute of management and international affairs

text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) today announced that former ambassador of the United States to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Joseph W. Westphal, Ph.D., has joined the firm as a senior advisor to the Global Industrial Market practice.
Westphal served as the U.S. ambassador to Saudi Arabia from 2014 to 2017. Prior to that, he was the under secretary of the U.S. Army and the Army’s chief management officer. His extensive experience in government includes holding positions in the administrations of Presidents Carter, Reagan, Clinton, Bush and Obama, during which he worked on policy issues including the environment, energy, national security, national infrastructure and development. Westphal also worked in the U.S. House of Representatives and the U.S. Senate for 12 years.
Westphal is currently senior global fellow at the Joseph H. Lauder Institute of Management and International Affairs, and senior fellow at the Leadership Center at the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania. He has served as the chancellor of the University of Maine System and has held academic positions at the University of Maine, Georgetown University, The New School University and Oklahoma State University. Westphal is also a fellow at the National Academy of Public Administration.
“Joe’s extensive experience with top leadership in Saudi Arabia and the Middle East is unparalleled,” said Yannick Binvel, President, Global Industrial Market, Korn Ferry. “His deep expertise will further strengthen our firm’s talent advisory partnerships in the region. We are thrilled to welcome him to our team.”
Westphal holds a Ph.D. in Political Science from the University of Missouri-Columbia. He was born in Santiago, Chile, and is fluent in Spanish.
About Korn Ferry
Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help companies design their organization – the structure, the roles and responsibilities, as well as how they compensate, develop and motivate their people. As importantly, we help organizations select and hire the talent they need to execute their strategy. Our approximately 7,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries.
